function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on strict quarantines as the main epidemic prevention measure","Impact":"Potential failure to control the spread of highly infectious viruses like SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Implementation of additional preventive measures alongside quarantine, such as vaccination, testing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing facilities, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate reduction in infected curves with a small number of infected humans","Impact":"Risk of underestimating the severity of the epidemic and not taking necessary preventive measures","Mitigation":"Enhanced monitoring and surveillance to detect early signs of outbreaks and take appropriate actions","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, early detection algorithms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities, decision-makers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient effectiveness of quarantine measures due to population density and distribution","Impact":"Inability to limit the spread of COVID-19 in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of targeted quarantine strategies based on population density and movement patterns","Technologies":"Geolocation data, demographic analytics, mobility tracking","People":"Populations in densely populated areas, urban planners, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning authorities"}]}
